titles.title: CAIR Reinstatement Act of 2008
A bill to provide that the Clean Air Interstate Rule shall remain in full force and effect.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 9/11/2008--Introduced. CAIR Reinstatement Act of 2008 - Directs the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to implement the Clean Air Interstate Rule (CAIR) and the rule establishing Federal Implementation Plans for CAIR. Declares that nothing in this Act shall change or modify the authority or obligations set forth in the Clean Air Act.
